/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. A white car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise serene setting. In the distance, a building with a red roof stands out, its traditional architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the trees and buildings. The overall composition of the image beautifully captures the blend of nature, architecture, and urban life in Beijing.
